dcterms:creator: M. Wevers
N. Vriend
A. de Bruin
dcterms:description: The De Boer Scene Detection dataset contains 39,866 gray-scale historical press photographs from 1950 to 1999, focusing on various mundane scenes, making it suitable for exploring visual elements that carry temporal information.
dcterms:title: De Boer Scene Detection dataset

dcterms:description: The Date Estimation in the Wild (DEW) dataset is used for estimating the dates of scanned historical photos, covering the period from 1930 to 1999, and is suitable for image retrieval approaches.
dcterms:title: Date Estimation in the Wild (DEW) dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Stacchio
A. Angeli
G. Lisanti
D. Calanca
G. Marfia
dcterms:description: IMAGO is a family photo album dataset designed for socio-historical analysis of the twentieth century, providing insights into family dynamics and historical contexts through photographs.
dcterms:title: IMAGO: A family photo album dataset
